nodes.text: The Ezaraa were a species of warmongering carnivorous sentients that were native to the the planet Ezaraa. They intended to overthrow the Galactic Empire, only to replace it with their own dominion and feed on the other species, which they deemed as lesser to them. To arm their revolution, the dominion sent Ezaraa to take advantage of opportunities such as the Auction of Rur.

The Ezaraa made up the entirety of the Dominion of the Ezaraa, a warmongering faction that had control of two continents on their homeworld of Ezaraa. The Dominion intended to overthrow Galactic Empire and replace it as the ruling government of the galaxy. Once in power they would feed on the other species, which they deemed as lesser to them.

The Dominion of the Ezaraa yearned to rule the universe and sought out anything that could arm them against their opposition. One of them visited the Citadel of Ktath'atn in an attempt to trade an oddity to the queen there in exchange for a favor of the Dominion's choice. The attempt did not succeed, however. The Dominion of the Ezaraa also visited the auction of the conscious kyber crystal containing the Eternal Rur, in the hopes of obtaining and weaponizing it. They promised the host of the auction, Doctor Chelli Aphra, a share of their Dominion, if she granted them the crystal and they were ever successful in taking over the galaxy. The kyber crystal, however, was able to possess a Cyban Front droid and the Ezaraa were killed in the following massacre.
The Ezaraa species first appeared in the canon crossover comic The Screaming Citadel 1, written by Kieron Gillen, illustrated by Marco Checchetto and released on May 10 2017.
